casebody.data:
UTILITIES COMM. et al.
v.
COOPER. No. 343P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. James H. Jeffries, Charlotte, for Utilities Commission. Jane Lewis-Raymond, for PNGC. Gina Holt, for Public Staff.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of June 2006 by Attorney General to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
